name: Bald Man Climbs Up
description:
A bald man embarks on a punishing and difficult journey to get as high as possible. Climb up slowly or use your unique precision charge weapon to climb higher and faster with increased difficulty and greater risks.



The higher baldie gets, the more difficult and stressful it becomes. Especially if you choose hardcore mode...

  • Large map with tons of unique areas
  • Precision gun mechanic
  • High degree of difficulty
  • Something special for those who reach the top
  • Fall down and lose your progress
  • You won't make it, just give up
